entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow this afternoon. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blizzard. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the morning then snow and blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:09 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
